scripts.gh-pages-deploy: git checkout -f master && git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git --work-tree out add --all && git --work-tree out commit -m 'gh-pages' && git push origin HEAD:gh-pages --force && git checkout -f master
scripts.deploy: next build && next export && cp CNAME ./out/CNAME && cp .nojekyll ./out/.nojekyll && npm run gh-pages-deploy
